reason: The agent successfully opens the VLC app and navigates to the internal storage to find the DCIM folder. However, the agent fails to add the DCIM folder to favorites. The agent long presses on the DCIM folder, but instead of adding it to favorites, it brings up a delete confirmation dialog. The agent then tries again, but the same thing happens. The agent seems to be stuck in a loop. The agent should have clicked the three dots next to the DCIM folder to bring up the context menu, and then clicked "Add to favorites".
